channel.title: CVE Feed for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- rdesktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Check Point Software Technologies Ltd. -- rdesktop

item.title: CVE-2018-8792|2024-09-17T02:17:12.258Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- rdesktop
item.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Read in function cssp_read_tsrequest() that results in a Denial of Service (segfault).

item.title: CVE-2018-8794|2024-09-17T00:21:28.777Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- rdesktop
item.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Integer Overflow that leads to an Out-Of-Bounds Write in function process_bitmap_updates() and results in a memory corruption and possibly even a remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2018-8799|2024-09-17T03:17:41.670Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- rdesktop
item.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Out-Of-Bounds Read in function process_secondary_order() that results in a Denial of Service (segfault).

item.title: CVE-2018-8793|2024-09-17T00:51:39.691Z -- check%20point%20software%20technologies%20ltd. -- rdesktop
item.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function cssp_read_tsrequest() that results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.
